name: One More Second
description:
It's a story about a famliy daily life which full of LOVE~~

======= Notice =========

Two gamepad suggested.

Please reset the game for the first battle due to the minor bug.

======= Control ========

R - reset game

QEZC / Gamepad Face Button  - select limb

WSAD / Gamepad Left Thumbstick - move pelvis

Anykey- skip 

Mouse / Gamepad Right Thumbstick - move limb
